normalised: home loan bonanza this festive season!

unnormalised: Heads up, future homeowners! With Onam just around the corner, banks are rolling out the red carpet with some sweet home loan schemes. Forget slaving over a hot stove making biryani – start looking for your dream home instead!
normalised: heads up, future homeowners! with onam just around the corner, banks are rolling out the red carpet with some sweet home loan schemes. forget slaving over a hot stove making biryani – start looking for your dream home instead!

unnormalised: SBI and HDFC are reportedly offering rates starting from a juicy 8.5% – that's lower than your average inflation! Imagine, owning that 2BHK in Powai you've always dreamt of.
normalised: S B I and H D F C are reportedly offering rates starting from a juicy eight point five percent – that's lower than your average inflation! imagine, owning that two B H K in powai you've always dreamt of.

unnormalised: Plus, PNB is tempting folks with zero processing fees for a limited time. That's extra cash for those Diwali lights, right?
normalised: plus, P N B is tempting folks with zero processing fees for a limited time. that's extra cash for those diwali lights, right?

unnormalised: Experts are saying this is a great time to buy, especially for first-timers. Don't be like Sharmaji and miss out! Get your documents ready and talk to your bank ASAP. This offer isn't going to last forever! Remember to compare offers carefully before diving in. Happy house hunting!
